desc: RevNon: Reverse the sentiment of the non-target aspects with originally the same sentiment as target.

examples.ori: BEST spicy tuna roll, great asian salad.ï¼ˆTarget: spicy tuna roll)
examples.trans: BEST spicy tuna roll, not great asian salad.

examples.ori: The food was extremely tasty, creatively presented and the wine excellent. (Target: wine)
examples.trans: The food was extremely tasty, creatively presented but the wine not excellent.
